    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.getGoalIds</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>getGoalIds</name>
        <script><![CDATA[function getGoalIds(portfolioId, strategicObjectives) {
	var ids = [];
	getStrategyGoals(portfolioId, strategicObjectives, 'm2m_enterprise_s_goals', 'enterprise_strategy');
	getStrategyGoals(portfolioId, strategicObjectives, 'm2m_bu_s_goals', 'business_unit_strategy');
	return ids;
	
	function getStrategyGoals(portfolioId, strategicObjectives, m2mTable, m2mColumn){
		var goalGr = new GlideRecord("goal");
		goalGr.addActiveQuery();
		var portfolioGr = new GlideRecord("pm_portfolio");
		if (portfolioId && portfolioGr.get(portfolioId)) {
			goalGr.addEncodedQuery('portfolio='+ portfolioId + '^ORportfolioISEMPTY');
		}
		if(JSUtil.notNil(strategicObjectives)){
			var sq1 = goalGr.addJoinQuery(m2mTable, 'sys_id', 'goal');
			sq1.addCondition(m2mColumn, 'IN', strategicObjectives);
		}
		goalGr.query();
		while (goalGr.next()) {
			ids.push(goalGr.getValue('sys_id'));
		}
		return ids;
	}
}]]></script>
